content: Hi, I am Mahmut Bulut. Working on Rust since 2012. Yes 2012, with intermittent intervals. I want to get back on the track. My mentor was oli-obk and I wanted to work on miri related things. Currently there are couple of open and closed PRs to some I-unsound and Miri related things from my side. I am happy to work on these topics. I might need heavy guidance because I didn't contributed for a long time. + recent LLVM ICEbreaker here.
this is probably something for @oli if they are able to help
